## GivetyStore class

Abstract base class of Givety data store implementations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class GivetyStore<T = unknown> 
```

## Remarks

The type parameter `T` may be used to type extra state added to [GivetyStoreState](./lib-base.givetystorestate.md) by the subclass.

Implemented by [BlockPolledGivetyStore](./lib-ethers.blockpolledgivetystore.md)<!-- -->.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [logging](./lib-base.givetystore.logging.md) |  | boolean | Turn console logging on/off. |
|  [onLoaded?](./lib-base.givetystore.onloaded.md) |  | () =&gt; void | <i>(Optional)</i> Called after the state is fetched for the first time. |
|  [state](./lib-base.givetystore.state.md) |  | [GivetyStoreState](./lib-base.givetystorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The current store state. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [start()](./lib-base.givetystore.start.md) |  | Start monitoring the blockchain for Givety state changes. |
|  [subscribe(listener)](./lib-base.givetystore.subscribe.md) |  | Register a state change listener. |
